project_abstract.cdata: An integrated rural development project is proposed consisting of (a) construction of irrigation and drainage works for rice schemes; (b) improvements to dry cultivation of maize, cotton and groundnuts; (c) livestock development; (d) seasonal and medium-term credit to project farmers; (e) further studies on crops and hydrology and a feasibility study for a possible second phase; (f) improvements to health facilities and (g) rehabilitation of the freight service on Lake Malawi.
